trans-unit.source: Handles the painting functionality for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> objects, applying a custom palette and a streamlined style.
trans-unit.target: Manipula a funcionalidade de pintura para os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, aplicando uma paleta personalizada e um estilo simplificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> creates pens and brushes based on a replaceable color table called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> cria canetas e pincéis com base em uma tabela de cores substituível chamada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a composite control that mimics the **Navigation Pane** provided by Microsoft® Outlook®.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um controle composto que simule o **painel de navegação** fornecidas pelo Microsoft® Outlook.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Create a Professionally Styled ToolStrip Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-professionally-styled-toolstrip-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma listagem de código completo, consulte [como: criar um profissional estilo do controle ToolStrip](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-professionally-styled-toolstrip-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" />.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> classe.

trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable" /> a ser usado para pintura.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripContentPanelBackground" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripContentPanelBackground" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripContentPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripPanelBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether edges of controls have a rounded rather than a square or sharp appearance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as bordas dos controles são arredondadas em vez quadradas ou curvadas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to round off control edges; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Para arredondar bordas do controle; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
